scripts.install-all: cd ./fastify-openapi && npm install && ../engine && npm install && ../rest-api && npm install && ../web-ui && npm install
scripts.build-deps: cd ./fastify-openapi && npm run build && cd ../engine && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently --names "engine,rest-api,web-ui" "cd ./engine && npm start" "cd ./rest-api && npm start" "cd ./web-ui && npm start"
